Container.Name: ama
Container.Description: Automated Music Archiver :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client
Container.Overview: Automated Music Archiver :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client

Config.Name: Host Path for /config
Config.Description: Container Path: /config

Config.Name: Host Path for /downloads-ama
Config.Description: Container Path for downloads library...

Config.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Config.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Config.Name: Script Interval
Config.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

Config.Name: DL Client ARL Token
Config.Description: User token for dl client, for instructions to obtain token: https://notabug.org/RemixDevs/DeezloaderRemix/wiki/Login+via+userToken

Config.Name: Download Mode
Config.Description: artist or discography :: artist mode downloads all albums listed as that artist, discography downloads all albums listed as that artist and featured in albums

Config.Name: Related Artist
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this lets the script crawl your artist list for related artists and process them

Config.Name: Related Artist -> Related Artist (loop)
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this lets the script crawl your related artists for additional related artists and process them accordingly :: WARNING this will cause an endless loop (spider crawling) until no more are found...

Config.Name: Artist Related Count
Config.Description: Maximum number of related artists to import per artist (20 is max)

Config.Name: Artist Fan Count
Config.Description: Minimum number of fans required for processing

Config.Name: Format
Config.Description: SET TO: ALAC or FLAC or AAC or MP3 or OPUS

Config.Name: Conversion Bitrate
Config.Description: FLAC -> OPUS/AAC/MP3 will be converted using this bitrate

Config.Name: Album Type Filter
Config.Description: Filter Types: COMPILE, SINGLE, ALBUM, EP (this is a

Config.Name: Download Concurrency
Config.Description: Controls download concurrency

Config.Name: Music Require Quality
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Requires all downloaded files match target file extension (mp3 or flac) when enabled

Config.Name: Download Concurrency
Config.Description: Controls download concurrency

Config.Name: Folder Permissions
Config.Description: Based on chmod linux permissions

Config.Name: File Permissions
Config.Description: Based on chmod linux permissions

Config.Name: Music Replaygain Tagging
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Scans and analyzes files to add replaygain tags to song metadata

Config.Name: Remove Artsit Without Image
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this will prevent downloading albums from artists with default image (non-unique)

Config.Name: Complete My Artists
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Eanabling this will add artist id's found in the library directory that are currently not in your list. This will then allow the script archive them accordingly :: !!!WARNING!!! Could cause an endless loop!

Config.Name: Lidarr List Import
Config.Description: true = enabled :: imports artist list from lidarr

Config.Name: Lidarr Url
Config.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

Config.Name: Lidarr API Key
Config.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

Config.Name: Plex Scan Notifications
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Plex must have a Music library added and also be configured with the /downloads-ama directory

Config.Name: Plex Library Name
Config.Description: This must exactly match the name of the Plex Library that contains the Lidarr Media Folder data

Config.Name: Plex Url
Config.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...

Config.Name: Plex Token
Config.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...

Config.Name: USER_ID
Config.Description: Container Variable: USER_ID

Config.Name: GROUP_ID
Config.Description: Container Variable: GROUP_ID
